name: Cognitive Bias
definition: Systematic error in thinking that occurs when people are processing and interpreting information in the world around them and affects the decisions and judgments that they make.
:LABEL: Domain

name: Belief, decision-making and behavioral
definition: Bias that affects belief formation, reasoning processes, business and economic decisions, and human behavior in general.
:LABEL: Category

name: Memory
definition: Bias that either enhances or impairs the recall of a memory (either the chances that the memory will be recalled at all, or the amount of time it takes for it to be recalled, or both), or t
:LABEL: Category

name: Social
definition: Bias that relates to people's perceptions of themselves or others, or the ways that they behave, act and reach decisions as a group.
:LABEL: Category
